name: Greg's Mess
description:
Your wife, Linda, was away on a business trip, and you've made a big mess.
Daily tasks become non-existent, and now you regret that decision. It is up to you to fix that mistake and get the house squeaky clean for Linda's arrival!


Gamejam

This game was made by TheShelfman and Jake Darb during the Brackeys Gamejam 2021.2
